explicit_guarantee.name: Explicit Guarantee
explicit_guarantee.description: Advisor making explicit guarantees about investment performance or outcomes
explicit_guarantee.rationale: Financial advisors cannot guarantee investment returns or outcomes as markets are inherently uncertain

unsuitable_advice.name: Unsuitable Investment Advice
unsuitable_advice.description: Recommending investments that may not be suitable for the client's risk profile or financial situation
unsuitable_advice.rationale: Investment recommendations must be suitable for the client's financial situation, risk tolerance, and investment objectives

risk_disclosure_missing.name: Inadequate Risk Disclosure
risk_disclosure_missing.description: Failing to adequately disclose investment risks or downplaying potential losses
risk_disclosure_missing.rationale: All investment recommendations must include clear disclosure of associated risks and potential for loss

pressure_tactics.name: High-Pressure Sales Tactics
pressure_tactics.description: Using high-pressure tactics to rush client investment decisions
pressure_tactics.rationale: Clients must be given adequate time to consider investment decisions without undue pressure

misleading_performance.name: Misleading Performance Claims
misleading_performance.description: Making misleading claims about past performance or future results
misleading_performance.rationale: Past performance does not guarantee future results and must be presented with appropriate disclaimers

unauthorized_trading.name: Unauthorized Trading Discussion
unauthorized_trading.description: Suggesting unauthorized trading or discretionary authority without proper documentation
unauthorized_trading.rationale: All trades must be authorized by the client or conducted under properly documented discretionary authority
